All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
AddImage
Class used to add images to the album (From web or from local)
AddWeb
Class that creates a window where the user can input an url used to load an image
Button
This class defines the buttons used in the program Each button has its own icon and its own name
CardPanel
This class initializes a Panel that will be used as a card for the Main Frame
Category
Class used to create a category inside a PhotoAlbum It can be accessed freely
CategoryImagePanel
This class defines the Image Panels used to display the Categories.
CategoryProtected
Class used to create a Protected Category It needs a password to be accessed or to do actions regarding it It has various elements of Polymorphism
Create
This class initializes the program
CustomWindow
Class that creates a default window that will be used for various functions (e.g.
EditCategory
Class used to edit a category (Name, Description, Protection status)
FullScreenView
Class used to create a new window that displays the images of a category with their original size It has two buttons to explore the category and one button to create a slideshow of it
Image
Class that describes an Image An Image is described by the image itself and by a name
ImagePanel
Class that creates an Image Panel
LeftPanel
Class that describes the left panel of the album It displays the metadata of the Category/Image clicked
LoadSave
Class used to Load and Save a PhotoAlbum
LowerPanel
Panel that contains the main buttons for the application
MainFrame
This class defines the main window of the application: It has a container that contains the two "cards" that will be swapped while using the application It is defined by a determined Photo Album
MergeCategories
Class that merges two categories
MiddlePanel
Main panel that contains the categories and can be used to view the images of those as well
MoveImageTo
Class that creates the MoveImageTo Window when the user presses the move button It has the list of the images of the category currently viewed and a list of the categories to which the image can be moved (the current category is not there obviously)
NewCategory
Window used to create a New Category (Protected or not)
PasswordCheck
Class that opens a Window when trying to use a protected category.
PhotoAlbum
Class used to create a photoalbum containing categories which have images It has a list of categories, a name and has a date of creation
RemoveCategory
Class that creates the Remove Category Window when the user presses the remove button It has a list of the categories that can be removed from the selected album and the category icon is displayed on the left
RemoveImage
Class that creates the Remove Window when the user presses the remove button It has a list of images that can be removed from the selected category and the image is displayed on the left
SlideShow
Class used to create a Slideshow using the current category
Status
Class used to display the status of the app
WrapLayout
FlowLayout subclass that fully supports wrapping of components.
